body_html:
Looks like the problem may be caused by CUDA_CC_VER used in absl/base/config.h
This is already fixed in the head of absl.
@ibebrett Your build will be fixed if you also update this block to use a newer commit:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/workspace.bzl#L110

Could you make that change in this PR too?

body:
Looks like the problem may be caused by `CUDA_CC_VER` used in `absl/base/config.h`
This is already fixed in the head of absl.
@ibebrett Your build will be fixed if you also update this block to use a newer commit:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/workspace.bzl#L110

Could you make that change in this PR too?
